NavigatorRequestMIDIAccess.summary:
The requestMIDIAccess() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref('Promise')}} representing a request for access to MIDI devices on a user's system.
This method is part of the Web MIDI API, which provides a means for accessing, enumerating, and manipulating MIDI devices.

remarks.para:
This method may prompt the user for access to MIDI devices available to their system, or it may use a previously established preference to grant or deny access.
If permission is granted then the resolves and a MIDIAccess object is returned.

NavigatorRequestMIDIAccess.returns: A that resolves with a MIDIAccess object.
